title: Google\Cloud\Channel\V1\ListOffersRequest
name: ListOffersRequest
description:
Request message for ListOffers.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.channel.v1.ListOffersRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The resource name of the reseller account from which to list Offers. Parent uses the format: accounts/{account_id}.

params.name: data.page_size
params.description: Optional. Requested page size. Server might return fewer results than requested. If unspecified, returns at most 500 Offers. The maximum value is 1000; the server will coerce values above 1000.

params.name: data.page_token
params.description: Optional. A token for a page of results other than the first page.

params.name: data.filter
params.description: Optional. The expression to filter results by name (name of the Offer), sku.name (name of the SKU), or sku.product.name (name of the Product). Example 1: sku.product.name=products/p1 AND sku.name!=products/p1/skus/s1 Example 2: name=accounts/a1/offers/o1

params.name: data.language_code
params.description: Optional. The BCP-47 language code. For example, "en-US". The response will localize in the corresponding language code, if specified. The default value is "en-US".
